full_summary:
Operation and Maintenance of the Lourdes-de-Blanc-Sablon Airport
================================================----------

### Tender Overview

Transport Canada invites bids for a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the operation and maintenance of the Lourdes-de-Blanc-Sablon Airport facilities. This services agreement, CB-120-906998, is subject to contract amendment 4. The tender closes on February 2, 2024, at 14:00:00.

### Contract Details

- **Reference Number**: CB-120-906998
- **Solicitation Number**: T3033-230004
- **Tender Status**: Closed
- **Contract Category**: Service
- **Tender Method**: Competitive Open Bidding

### Contract Description

The successful bidder will be responsible for the administration, maintenance, and operation of the Lourdes-de-Blanc-Sablon Airport facilities, including:

- Runways, taxiways, aprons
- Access roads and parking areas
- Buildings (air terminal building, maintenance garage, warehouse)
- Assets (heavy equipment vehicles and tools)
- Systems (mechanical, electrical, and others)

The service provider will also be responsible for ensuring compliance with aviation regulations and all other applicable regulations on the airport site. Furthermore, the provider will collaborate with Transport Canada in implementing the Safety Management System (SMS).

### Requirements

- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Contracting Entity**: Transport Canada
- **Contact Information**: Hélène Lewis (514-208-5342, helene.lewis@tc.gc.ca)
